metadata.products: BC; BFL; BKX; BF; BD; BK; BJ; BCA; BA

body.body: The Service Manual for the above models incorrectly states the service tool part number for removing the cylinder liners fitted to the 1,700cc engines.
In the ‘Cylinder Liners Removal’ section of chapter 5, the second bullet point of the note should state:
For the 1,700 cc engine, use service tool extractor, liner T3880122.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.

title: Cylinder Liner Removal Service Tool
